channel.title: Networking on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Home

item.title: Snort
item.description: This is a project I did for my computer security class where I made an intrusion detection system (IDS) and attempted to make an intrusion prevention system (IPS)

item.title: Samba File Server
item.description: This was a Samba File server that I setup on my latptop running linux to send files from my pc to my laptop.
